description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You never thought going into space was a good idea... Turns out you were right.  See how long you can survive in this simple and fun-to-play shooter.
description.short: You never thought going into space was a good idea... Turns out you were right.  See how long you can survive in this simple and fun-to-play shooter.
